snippet: Tom Watson, captain of the United States team for the Ryder Cup, said Monday that Tiger Woods’s latest back injury “doesn’t bode well” for Woods’s participation.
abstract: Tom Watson, captain of the United States team for the Ryder Cup, says it is unlikely that Tiger Woods will participate because of his latest back injury.
lead_paragraph: Tom Watson, captain of the United States team for the Ryder Cup, said Monday that Tiger Woods’s latest back injury “doesn’t bode well” for Woods’s participation.

headline.main: Back Injury Leaves Woods in Doubt for the Ryder Cup
